item.title: KNN Classifier to detect potential credit card fraud
item.description: Through this project, I was attempting to understand the K-nearest-neighbors classification algorithm and the process of selecting the optimal estimators. Understanding the dataset The dataset was a CSV file consisting of PCA values for certain transaction information to protect consumer privacy. The Amount feature is the amount of money in that particular transaction and the Class feature contains two classes safe and fraud Objective The goal was to find the optimal parameters of the KNN estimator using cross validation and then provide a final estimate of the model’s generalization performance via the test set.
